screenshots.caption: Download by entering the video URL

name: Free Youtube Downloader for Mac
short_description:
Find some interesting video clips on YouTube and want to know the simplest way to download them? Eager to install a powerful YouTube video downloader on your Mac but cannot afford the expense? If you are facing the above difficulties, look no further than Aimersoft Free YouTube Downloader for Mac.  Designed to be intuitive, this easy-to-use yet powerful software allows you to freely download any video you like from YouTube with one simple click. With its help, downloading YouTube videos will be dead easy. This software is not only a solid YouTube video downloader, but also an excellent video player. With the built-in player, 
you are able to happily enjoy FLV, MP4 and WebM videos in full screen the moment you finish downloading. Besides, the wonderful video library enables you to easily and conveniently manage the downloaded YouTube videos.
summary: With one simple click, you are able to freely download YouTube
